DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Must least 18 year age ; Life expectancy : At least 3 month ; Performance status : ECOG 0 1 ; Histologic cytologic proof solid tumor cancer amenable curative surgical resection ; Evaluable measurable disease document within 4 week start treatment ; Prior chemotherapy radiotherapy allow 4 week elapse prior start treatment patient recover toxicity prior treatment ; Adequate organ function : Hematopoietic : ANC = 1500/ul , Platelets = 100,000/ul , Hemoglobin = 9.5 g/dL , transfusion prior evaluation allow ; Hepatic : Bilirubin = 2.0 mg/dL less SGPT ( ALT ) SGOT ( AST ) < 3 x upper limit normal ( < 5 x upper limit normal liver metastasis present ) Renal : Serum Creatinine < 2.0 mg/dL ; Patient initiative , geographic proximity , mean compliant protocol ; Fertile patient ( male female ) must agree use effective contraception ; Must able swallow retain tablet . Exclusion Criteria Major surgery within four week precede start treatment ; Serious medical psychiatric illness would prevent selfdetermined informed consent ; Intensive chemotherapy treatment ; Infection antibiotic time screen ; Uncontrolled cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , neurologic , psychiatric , hepatic dysfunction ; Pregnant nursing ; Preexisting diarrhea uncontrolled clinically significant illness cancer ( i.e . ulcerative colitis , malabsorption syndrome ) ; Brain metastases stable 3 month ; Known Dihydropyrimidine Dehydrogenase ( DPD ) deficiency .
